author: Will Shanklin
title: Google claims to 'reaffirm’ Right to Repair support three years after lobbying against it
content: Google has officially voiced support for Right to Repair (R2R) legislation. Specifically, the company supports Oregons SB 542, championed by State Senator Janeen Sollman (D).

author: Richard Lai
title: Xreal Air 2 Ultra hands-on: Next-gen AR glasses in need of killer apps
content: Si vous cliquez sur « Tout accepter », nos partenaires (y compris 244 qui font partie du Cadre de transparence et de consentement dIAB) et nous utiliserons également des témoins et vos données personnel.

author: Gear Team
title: CES 2024: The 26 Best Gadgets You Can Buy Right Now
content: It's barely two weeks into the new year, but the flood of new gadgets for 2024 has already started. Thanks to CES, we've seen a ton of innovative tech launch into the marketplace.

author: barrons.com
title: So Long, Apple and Tesla. We Built a Better Magnificent 7
content: Apple, Meta Platforms, and Tesla are dropped in favor of stocks that provide more diversification than the Magnificent 7and have a better chance of outperforming.

author: benzinga.com
title: Happy 60th Birthday Jeff Bezos! The Billionaire Survived The Dot-Com Bubble Burst
content: Born on Jan. 12, 1964, Jeff Bezos is today the second-richest person in the world with a net worth of $180 billion, according to the Bloomberg Billionaire Index, following Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk.
